sentences.sContent: The game had to be abandoned due to bad weather.
sentences.sCn: 由于天气不好，比赛不得不中止。

sentences.sContent: They abandoned their attempt to recapture the castle.
sentences.sCn: 他们放弃了夺回城堡的努力。

sentences.sContent: Because of the fog they abandoned their idea of driving.
sentences.sCn: 因为有雾，他们打消了开车去的念头。

remMethod.val: a + band (乐队) + on → 一个乐队在台上激情演出 → 放纵

words.tran: 被抛弃的；无约束的；恣意放荡的；寡廉鲜耻的
抛弃（abandon的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to stop doing something because there are too many problems and it is impossible to continue
